patthana17.18:1.1_0: Kusalaṁ atītārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naatītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava,
patthana17.18:1.1_1: adhipatiyā nava …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
patthana17.18:2.1_0: Kusalaṁ anāgatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naanāgatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava,
patthana17.18:3.1_0: Kusalaṁ paccuppannārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo napaccuppannārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava,
patthana17.18:3.1_1: adhipatiyā nava …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
